items.sentence: It wasn\'t just Tom who saw Mary do what she said she didn\'t do.
It was still early in the day when Tom arrived at the campground.
Tom doesn\'t mind devoting a lot of time to helping the homeless.
I want a written report in my hands first thing tomorrow morning.
Tom knows it\'s only a matter of time until the police catch him.
Tom looked out the window and saw Mary\'s car in the parking lot.
He left home early in the morning so he wouldn\'t miss the train.
How long do you think it\'ll take until the pain is totally gone?
How long do you think you\'ll need to finish writing this report?
How many times do I have to tell you that I don\'t want you here?
Tom, Mary and John spent Saturday practicing for the talent show.
Tom\'s parents only stayed together for the sake of the children.
When I fell off my bicycle, I couldn\'t get up for a few minutes.
Tom said that he\'d give me thirty dollars if I ate an earthworm.
Tom will go to the supermarket for you and buy whatever you need.
I don\'t think I\'ll be able to make myself understood in French.
I don\'t think there\'s any chance that Tom will let you do that.
Mary isn\'t only prettier, but she gets better grades than Alice.
I wonder whether Tom has ever asked Mary why she didn\'t do that?
I wonder why they didn\'t make Tom do what he was supposed to do.
Would you ever eat live maggots? What about if I gave you $1,000?
Tom said he was planning on visiting an old girlfriend in Boston.
My only complaint is that where I work isn\'t closer to my house.
Were Tom and Mary speaking French, or were they speaking English?
What do you think is the best way to encourage Tom to study more?
If I\'d had enough money, I would\'ve gone to Australia with Tom.
Tom gave me a nice set of aluminum wheels, but he kept the tires.
Tom grabbed the gun away from Mary before she could kill herself.
Tom told Mary that he thought she shouldn\'t go there by herself.
I don\'t know where Tom is planning to spend his summer vacation.
I don\'t think any woman could ever really understand how I feel.
Tom gave Mary everything he had, but she still wasn\'t satisfied.
You have to tell Tom that you won\'t be going to Boston with him.
You know that Tom is still planning to join the team, don\'t you?
You should tell Tom that Mary isn\'t planning on taking pictures.
You\'re the only one who can get Tom to do what needs to be done.
Tom likes to sit on the dock with his feet dangling in the water.
Tom listened to what Mary had to say without showing any emotion.
Tom lives on a farm with his wife, Mary, not too far from Boston.
Tom might not realize what time the meeting is supposed to begin.
Tom isn\'t able to easily distinguish between boredom and hunger.
Is there any place around here where we can get something to eat?
I hired Tom because I thought he was the best person for the job.
Tom and Mary sat across from each other at a table in the corner.
Tom and Mary started dancing as soon as the band started playing.
Tom accidentally shot himself in the foot while cleaning his gun.
Tom always checks to verify that no dyes are in any food he buys.
Tom always orders the same thing when he eats at this restaurant.
Tom sometimes has trouble understanding other people\'s feelings.
Tom thinks it\'s important for Mary to learn how to speak French.
